courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours if topics vary. Prerequisite: Six hours of political science, or consent of instructor.
description: Selected readings and research in political science. See Class Schedule for current topics. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours if topics vary. Prerequisite: Six hours of political science, or consent of instructor.
label: Special Topics
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Political Science major(s). Not intended for students with Freshman class standing.
